name: Jinbe
text: On Play: Rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 1 or less.

effect.text: Rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 1 or less.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'NOT FOR SALE' in image. Power value is 5000, not 5000+2000 as shown in the counter box. Counter value is 2000.
